name: FunScienceQuestions-FlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Fun Science Questions is the perfect flash briefing for those learning about science and still, have lots of questions. What is a black hole? Where is the moon in the daytime? These kinds of science questions are exactly what we are here to help you answer. 

Family friendly and fun for everyone.

After you enable this Alexa skill, just say "Alexa, play my flash briefing" to start listing. This flash briefing is updated every day and will work on all Alexa Echo devices, Alexa enabled Kindle Fires and even on the go if you download the Alexa app on your mobile phone or tablet.

This flash briefing Alexa skill works great on:
Alexa Echo App
Alexa app for Kindle Fire
Amazon Echo Show (all)
Amazon Echo Spot
Amazon Echo (all) 
Amazon Echo Dot (all)
Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (all)
Amazon Fire Tablets (all)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
